data.title: FIFA Referees News
data.text:
Tanzania: 2018 Azam Sports Federation Cup Final

2018 Tanzania Federation Cup Final

2 June 2018 at Sheikh Amri Abeid Memorial Stadium, Arusha (Tanzania)

Mtibwa Sugar FC vs Singida United FC (3-2)

Referee: Emmanuel Mwandembwa (Tanzania)

Assistant Referee: Mohammed Mkono

Assistant Referee: Ferdinand Chacha

4th Official: Jonesia Rukya

2018 CAF Champions League - Final

2018 CAF Champions League - Final (2nd leg)

9 November 2018 at Stade Olympique de Radès, Radès (Tunisia)

Esperance Sportive Tunis(Tunisia) vs.El Ahly SC (Egypt)

(3-0)

Referee: Bamlak Tessema Weyesa (Ethiopia)

Assistant Referee: Zakhele Siwela (South Africa)

Assistant Referee: Waleed Ali Ahmed (Sudan)

4th official: Eric Otogo-Castane (Gabon)

VAR: Bakary Gassama (Gambia)

AVAR 1: El Hadji Samba (Senegal)

AVAR 2: Djibril Camara (Senegal)

----------------------------------------

2018 CAF Champions League - Final (1st leg)

2 November 2018 at Borg El Arab Stadium, Alexandria (Egypt)

El Ahly SC (Egypt) vs. Esperance Sportive Tunis (Tunisia) (3-1)

Referee: Mehdi Abid Charef (Algeria)

Assistant Referee: Abdelhak Etchiali (Algeria)

4th official: Eric Otogo-Castane (Gabon)

2019 FIFA Referee List - New CAF referees

2019 FIFA Referee List from CAF region has been announced.

It includes 38 new men central referees :

Congratulations to all of to them !
